properties.areaDesc: Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains; Northeast Bighorn Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 1:18PM MST until February 17 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Billings MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 9
inches...highest on west-facing slopes.

* WHERE...In Wyoming, Northeast Bighorn Mountains. In Montana,
Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains.

* WHEN...From noon Sunday to 6 AM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting to 25 mph will create areas
of blowing snow.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at
http://www.weather.gov/billings

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON SUNDAY TO 6 AM MST MONDAY
